channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: When Blaire's Instagram lover Markie broke her heart, she moved on. But now Markie is back and wants to meet. Blaire needs Nev and Max's help to make it happen and reveal Markie's secret. (S4, ep14).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Dylan receives an anonymous text warning him that his online love, Ally, is not who she says she is. After the mystery texter is revealed, Nev and Max uncover a huge web of deceit! (S6, ep10).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Celebs On The Ranch
channel.desc: Fun reality series as ten UK celebrities try their hands on an Arizona cattle ranch. The celebs face a Trailer Reversing Challenge, and we learn which of them can't drive. (S1, ep4).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish UK
channel.desc: Jerry needs help meeting his first love Karla. Karla claims to have already met Jerry but refuses to talk to him on the phone. Can Oobah and Nella find out if Karla is who she says she is? (S2, ep1).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Skin A&E
channel.desc: Top dermatologists help members of the public with a range of skin conditions. (S3, ep8).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Oasis
channel.desc: Legendary British rock band Oasis performed a number of their best hits unplugged, incl. \"Wonderwall\" and \"Don't Look Back In Anger\", at London's Royal Festival Hall in August 1996.

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Nirvana
channel.desc: On the 18th November 1993, Nirvana recorded their now legendary MTV Unplugged performance. Relive the special gig now, including seminal classics like 'Come As You Are' and 'All Apologies.

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Beavis And Butt-Head
channel.desc: Rabies Scare: Beavis is bitten by a dog and ends up having to go to hospital for rabies injections. (S4, E04).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Beavis And Butt-Head
channel.desc: They're Coming to Take Me Away, Huh Huh (aka Psychiatrist): Beavis and Butt-Head are forced to see the school psychiatrist after goofing off in class. (S4, E05).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Jackass
channel.desc: Johnny Knoxville gets pelted with paintballs in the behind-the-scenes footage of his magazine cover shoot, and Bam Margera leaps off a bridge with a large umbrella. (S2, ep5).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master
channel.desc: Four Artists remain but only three will earn a spot in the finale. Cleen and Christian are one step closer to settling the score in the ultimate Grudge Match. (S11, ep15).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master
channel.desc: Christian and Cleen Rock One return to settle the Grudge Match once and for all. The battle concludes as the top three Artists reveal their 35-hour Master Canvas tattoos. (S11, ep16).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Love At First Lie
channel.desc: There's only a small number of couples left and they've never been so exposed. But can the fakers keep up their lies? (S1, ep11).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: The Hills
channel.desc: After the drama at Jason's engagement party, Lauren needs to leave The Hills for a while. What better way to escape than to head to Vegas to surprise Brody on his 24th birthday? (S3, ep9).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: The Hills
channel.desc: After weeks of hard work, Whitney thinks she's finally found the perfect place for Teen Vogue to host the Young Hollywood party. But will the old church impress her boss? (S3, ep12).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: 16 & Pregnant
channel.desc: In this episode, we follow Amber, who's expecting a baby with her boyfriend Gary. They decide to move in together but it's not always easy for these teen parents. (S1, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teen Mom OG
channel.desc: Amber and Gary get ready for Leah's first day of school, while Catelynn continues to struggle with her anxiety. Ryan takes Bentley for the weekend, though Maci isn't convinced he's changed. (S6, ep10).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teen Mom OG
channel.desc: Amber and Matt attempt to put a stop to the tabloid rumours surrounding them, but are sidetracked by a visit from Matt's son. Tyler and Catelynn celebrate Butch's first year out of prison. (S6, ep11).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teen Mom OG
channel.desc: In an attempt to keep Matt's son sober, Amber and Matt invite him to move in. Catelynn and Tyler attempt to celebrate their first year of marriage, but are worried about Carly. (S6, ep12).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teen Mom OG
channel.desc: Farrah and her mother uncover old family wounds and get into a huge fight. Matt is offered the opportunity to write a book about his life, and Maci and Taylor head to Las Vegas. (S6, ep13).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
channel.desc: As Training Camp starts Kelli lays down the law. Girls start to crack as the reality of how hard it is to become a DCC sets in. Melissa Rycroft offers advice on how to make it through. (S10, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
channel.desc: Kelli and Judy must cut 10 girls to get to the magic number of 36 for the squad. Uniform fittings gives Kelli a better idea of who has the whole package. (S10, ep4).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: For shy Devan, meeting Rylan was love at first click. Devan wants to believe that Rylan is marriage material but her suspicious behaviour is leaving him with doubts. (S4, ep27).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Kimiko Glenn joins Nev in helping Matthew find his elusive Instagram love, Chance. But as they search for answers, they run into unsurpassable roadblocks that make them question everything. (S7, ep35).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Daisy met Marcus on Instagram and he instantly stole her heart. But Marcus won't speak to Daisy on the phone, let alone meet her in person, so Nev and Tyler try to arrange a face to face. (S4, ep6).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Model Dallas has had his sights set on sexy Safari ever since she slid into his dms - but despite flirty promises, she won't meet. Nev and co-host Tallulah Willis begin a hunt for Safari. (S7, ep25).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Max and co-host iO Tillett Wright help Mecca connect with a boy she's loved for years. But soon it's discovered that Mecca's digital beau may be using her pictures to catfish others! (S6, ep6).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Nev and Nick Young, aka Swaggy P, help Sheila figure out if she's being romanced by Love and Hip Hop's Rich Dollaz. Is it a fan girl crush or is Sheila really talking to the reality star? (S7, ep21).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: After 20 years, Motherwolff, a witch, is now ready for her true love David. Will their lifelong romance prove to be as magical as she dreams, or will she learn the hard way. (S8, ep74).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: After splitting from her husband of 20 years, Angela reinvented herself and is excited by her new love interest Justin. He's been dodgy about meeting, but she's ready for something real. (S8, ep77).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Kito is faced with not one, but three unhappy Canvases - including one of Ink Master's most infamous Canvases of all time. Can Kito keep his cool or will he lose his shot at redemption? (S2, ep1).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: James Vaughn returns to redeem one of the most infamous pin-up mistakes; Kyle Dunbar and Sebastian Murphy try to keep their cool when faced with unhappy canvases. (S2, ep2).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: James Vaughn returns to redeem one of the most infamous mistakes in Ink Master history. Faced with unhappy Canvases, can hotheads Kyle Dunbar and Sebastian Murphy keep their cool? (S2, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Unhappy Canvases bring back-up to face their Artists Ashley B. and Ally Lee in the Ink Master shop. Can Ashley and Ally keep their cool under pressure? (S2, ep4).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Sarah Miller returns to the Ink Master shop to call out Steve Tefft. Miami Burgess returns to call out Big Ceeze for the tattoo that sent him home. (S2, ep5).
